segments.text: Can I take your drink order ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The wine choices are posted on the little menu in the middle of the table .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you have any mixed drinks available here ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We can make a number of mixed drinks at our bar .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I heard that you are famous for your drinks . What are your specials ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our house special is our Cuervo Gold margarita .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I would love a margarita right now ! That is what I am going to order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I prepare your drink on the rocks , or would you prefer it blended ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer my margarita on the rocks , please .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you like your margarita with salt or no salt ?
segments.speaker: S1
